description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. What to do when Winter hits? "Snowy Slalom" brings home the excitement of this Winter sport, remarking the thrill of gliding downhill through the middle of a gentle snowstorm. Tracks are generated randomly, ensuring a bumpy ride. Tons of fun - weather permitting.
